title: Roads Authority | Building Safer Roads
snippet: The Roads Authority constructs and maintains Namibia's road sector, playing a pivotal role in road safety and economic development.

title: Background

title: Highway B2 Expansion Project Underway
snippet: Construction begins on the 60km expansion of Highway B2 between Okahandja and Karibib to improve connectivity and safety.

title: Road Safety Awareness Campaign
snippet: Road safety campaign and awareness initiatives across regions to reduce accidents and improve compliance.
